articles.author: Laura Dobberstein
articles.title: Chinese scientists calculate the Milky Way's mass as 805 billion times that of our Sun - The Register
articles.description: ALSO: Australia says offensive hacking is working; DJI hit with $279m patent suit; Philippines Police leak data; and more
articles.content:
Asia In Brief Chinese scientists have estimated the mass of the Milky Way.
To do so the authors considered 260,000 stars a larger number than has previously been used for a study of this type many o… [+6623 chars]
